pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Get subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

pathParameters.name: accountName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account.

queryParameters.name: $top
queryParameters.description: The number of items to return. Optional.

queryParameters.name: $skip
queryParameters.description: The number of items to skip over before returning elements. Optional.

queryParameters.name: $select
queryParameters.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

queryParameters.name: $orderby
queryParameters.description: OrderBy clause. One or more comma-separated expressions with an optional "asc" (the default) or "desc" depending on the order you'd like the values sorted, e.g. Categories?$orderby=CategoryName desc. Optional.

queryParameters.name: $count
queryParameters.description: The Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Get subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

pathParameters.name: accountName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Analytics account.

pathParameters.name: dataLakeStoreAccountName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account to add.
